html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-07902017-06-20,  GAC,  ,  , 
ActExport and Import Permits Act
SubjectOrder Amending the Area Control List
PrecisORDER AMENDING THE AREA CONTROL LIST in order to remove Belarus from the Area Control List (ACL), so that exporters of items that are not listed on Canada’s Export Control List (ECL) will no longer require an export permit under the Export and Import Permits Act in order to lawfully export those items to Belarus.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0138 Publication Date: 2017-07-12
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Amending the Area Control List
precis: ORDER AMENDING THE AREA CONTROL LIST in order to remove Belarus from the Area Control List (ACL), so that exporters of items that are not listed on Canada’s Export Control List (ECL) will no longer require an export permit under the Export and Import Permits Act in order to lawfully export those items to Belarus.
